function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differential effects of unexpected deprivation from work income on energy-related measures","Impact":"Potential impact on well-being and energy-related behaviors","Mitigation":"Support programs for individuals experiencing unexpected deprivation","Technologies":"Financial assistance programs","People":"Individuals experiencing unexpected deprivation from work income","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Differentiated impacts on health, income, and employment situation across ethnicities, gender, and income groups","Impact":"Increased inequalities and potential impact on public health","Mitigation":"Equitable access to healthcare and employment opportunities","Technologies":"Healthcare services and job training programs","People":"Ethnic minorities, women, low-income individuals","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, employment agencies"},{"Description":"Changes in behavior and cognitive dimensions due to COVID-19 response measures","Impact":"Potential impact on well-being and energy-related behaviors","Mitigation":"Support for mental health and well-being, education on energy conservation","Technologies":"Telehealth services, mental health support apps","People":"General population affected by COVID-19 response measures","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health professionals, education institutions"}]}
